package.name: Image_GraphViz
package.description: The GraphViz class allows for the creation of and the work with directed and undirected graphs and their visualization with AT&T's GraphViz tools.

release.notes: * Allow for edges without attributes. (Patch by Carsten Saathoff <kodemaniak@gmx.de>)

* Added escaping of node descriptions. (Patch by Garvin Hicking <hicking@faktor-e.de>)
* Improved compatibility with Win32 version of dot/neato. (Patch by Garvin Hicking <hicking@faktor-e.de>)
* Changed Image_GraphViz.php to Image/GraphViz.php.
